items.title: holiday
items.comment: Refers to a **holiday** or **vacation period**, typically used for longer breaks.

items.title: holiday (day off)
items.comment: Refers to a **day off** or **holiday**. Often used for weekends or public holidays.

items.title: festival
items.comment: Refers to a **festival** or **traditional holiday**. For example, Chinese New Year (**春节 - chūnjié**).

items.title: Chinese New Year
items.comment: Refers to **Chinese New Year**, one of the most important holidays in China, celebrated on the first day of the lunar calendar.

items.title: National Day
items.comment: Refers to **National Day** (October 1st), celebrating the founding of the People's Republic of China.

items.title: Mid-Autumn Festival
items.comment: Refers to **Mid-Autumn Festival**, celebrated on the 15th day of the 8th lunar month, associated with moon worship and mooncakes.
